Text: Cortis took Portelli to court for repayment of the outstanding debt, at the time €52,800 but which was later partly repaid, leaving a balance of €6,284.81.
Cause: Cortis took Portelli to court for repayment of the outstanding debt, at the time €52,800 but which was later partly repaid
Sentence: <e1>Cortis took Portelli to court for repayment of the outstanding debt, at the time €52,800 but which was later partly repaid</e1>, <e2>leaving a balance of €6,284.81.</e2>
